header.name: chaos/preprocessor/logical/nand.h
header.author: Paul Mensonides
header.overview: The header defines a logical NAND operator.

macro.abstract: The macro expands to the logical NAND of its operands.

usage.param: The left operand. Valid values range from 0 to .
The right operand. Valid values range from 0 to .

macro.para: If both p and q are non-zero, this macro expands to 0. Otherwise, it expands to 1.
This macro performs a Boolean conversion on each operand. If this conversion is undesireable, may be used instead.
This macro is lazy. If p is 0, q is not evaluated.
